name: RealSpot - Skateboarding
description:
The game is  an early prototype of a skateboard simulation.
You are playing on a real world terrain (The Cradle Skatepark, Brixlegg, Austria), captured with a 3d laser scanner in 2014.
Its a freetime fun project  made with unity 3d.
Currently spending time to get a nice gameplay with realistic controls and of course getting the map finished in terms of graphics.

...The real bowl of the skatepark is currently under water, so i decided to make the project public at this early stage... allowing you to drive a bit on the unfinished map
